body_html: I have not considered the invalidity of our virtualenv command for py3. You have a good point there. Id rather have a shorter installation guide, but we should have a working install path for all versions of python installed.

body: I have not considered the invalidity of our virtualenv command for py3. You have a good point there. Id rather have a shorter installation guide, but we should have a working install path for all versions of python installed.
